articles.description: The Society of Indian Automobile Manufacturers has announced to organise the Auto Expo in 2023. If reports are to be believed, the 2023 Edition of Auto Expo will be held between January 13 and January 18. SIAM had cancelled the Auto Expo 2022 due to COVID-19 …

articles.title: Future group shares under pressure; Future Retail tanks 7.88% - Economic Times
articles.description: Listed companies of the Kishore Biyani-led Future group on Saturday informed the exchanges about the meetings of their respective shareholders and creditors on April 20 and 21 to get their approval for the Rs 24,713-crore deal with Reliance Retail.
articles.content: New Delhi: Shares of Future group of companies were under pressure on Monday with Future Lifestyle Fashions and Future Retail tanking the most in tandem with a weak broader market. Future Lifestyle F… [+1504 chars]

articles.title: 50 Rupees, 2-Minute Battery Change: Bengaluru's New Rides - NDTV
articles.description: For time-pressed delivery drivers in Bengaluru, replenishing the batteries of the electric auto rickshaws increasingly being used to ferry everything from people to groceries around India's teeming tech hub can now take just a matter of minutes.
articles.content:
